title: What kind of fire power do drones have? - Quora

response.answer_text: Small and micro UAVs (including multi rotor , conventional Helicopters and fixed with crafts ) are mostly battery operated (Lithium chemistry batteries) and small engines are also used in some cases (only for fixed wing crafts and Helis). On the other case , most advanced drone's like Predator, Heron (defence use) , are running with hybrid propulsion systems.

So the drone you are probably asking about is the US’s MQ-1 Predator drone. The Predator can carry two AGM-114 Hellfire missiles. Basically, two missiles capable of destroying houses and even tanks (if hit in the right place).  I hope that this answered your question.
